mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into th_charge (cardId, cardNo, createTime, deleted, money, moneyType, orderNo, `state`, `type`, userName, userId) values (#{cardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{moneytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update th_charge set cardId = #{cardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardNo = #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, moneyType = #{moneytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, cardId, cardNo, createTime, deleted, money, moneyType, orderNo, `state`, `type`, userName, userId from th_charge where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
